amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 117-9 to strike Subtitle C of Title III "Enhancing Protections for United States Democratic Instructions" creating a national strategy to protect US democratic institutions by establishing a national commission.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike subtitle C of title III, the election security title in the bill, which requires the President to produce a national strategy for protecting U.S. democratic institutions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis, Rodney amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 207 - 218 (Roll no. 54).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Davis, Rodney.
